word_mean: 结构破坏：器官组织的破坏过程。能使某一器官或结构中的组织丧失其大部分或全部原有特性的深重变化

sentence.Network_en: The result is immorality and delinquency; in short, personal and social disorganization.
sentence.Network_cn: 其后果便是道德堕落与犯罪现象, 简言之, 就是个人的与社会的解组.

sentence.Network_en: In the ministries and departments of the Central Government the greatest disorganization was apparent.
sentence.Network_cn: 中央政府各部中存在着很显著的严重混乱现象.

sentence.Network_en: Anderson, who is president of the National Study Group on Chronic Disorganization.
sentence.Network_cn: 安德森是全国慢性失范研究组织(NationalStudyGrouponChronicDisorganization)的主席.

list.abs: 社会解组（social disorganization）（Social disorganization）是指社会设置的崩溃。一个高度组织的社会系统能承受大量的越轨而不会出现严重混乱。
social disintegration 社会解体social disorganization 社会瓦解social dissidence 社会异议

entry.tran: 缺乏组织;无系统;杂乱无章
entry.def: If something is in a state of disorganization, it is disorganized.

means.word_mean: 1. a condition in which an orderly system has been disrupted
2. the disturbance of a systematic arrangement causing disorder and confusion;

sentences.sentence: "the disorganization of the enemy troops by a flank attack"
